name: AFORT
description: A web repository of Attack Trees. This is part of the work I'm doing under Prof. Rajesh Kumar of BITS Pilani for attack trees.

name: learn-qiskit
description: As an attempt at learning the ins and outs of qiskit, as well as to actually apply quantum computing, I'm implementing some alogrithms in qiskit.

name: Quantum Image Encryption
description: As part of my internship at UST Global, I've been implementing Quantum Image Encryption from [this paper](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8119911), which uses NEQR, Image Scrambling, and 2-D logistic sine-map.
